attributes.action: Remove the union flag from anyone in Scotland's driving licence
attributes.additional_details: The union flag was put on driving licence's after the 2014 independence referendum, it was David Cameron's way of telling Scots that we belong to the UK ( England) and to stop getting above ourselves.
attributes.background: I'm asking that anyone who wants the union flag removed should be allowed to have it removed.

rejection.details:
We think that this petition is similar:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/250844
